title: Meghan Markle’s Capsule Wardrobe Is Expertly Curated—Shop Her Exact Picks Here
description: Including a $100 trench coat that’s perfect for spring.
excerpt: Including a $100 trench coat and Alix Earle’s skinny jeans.
text: As if the titles mother, wife, actress, Duchess, philanthropist, and entrepreneur weren’t enough, today, Meghan Markle takes on a new role: personal shopper. If you found yourself watching With Love, Meghan and envying her simple yet sophisticated style, I’ve got good news for you: The Duchess of Sussex took to her Instagram Stories today to share some of her personal wardrobe favorites, complete with shoppable links.“A handpicked and curated collection of the things I love—I hope you enjoy them!” reads the banner on Markle’s ShopMy profile, along with a notice that she may earn commission from the affiliate links. “Many of you have asked, so here you go!” she wrote as a caption. Most of her picks are refreshingly affordable and come from stores you might already shop at like Gap, J.Crew, Reformation, and Veronica Beard, for example. In addition to capsule wardrobe staples in cream, navy, and brown tones, you can also shop some of Markle’s favorite accessories, including a bag from celebrity-loved brand St. Agni and her signature Ray-Ban aviators. And let the record show that the Duchess is on board with both flare and skinny jeans, citing Alix Earle’s denim collaboration, specifically. Below, browse some of the most shoppable items out of the more than 30 favorites that Markle shared. Everyone say, “Thank you, Meghan!”Heidi Merrick Windsor Gown Reformation Andy Oversized Linen Shirt Madewell Cotton Relaxed Oversized TeeJ.Crew Featherweight Cashmere-Blend Cropped Sweater ShellBleusalt The Perfect TJ.Crew Wide-Leg Essential Pant Now 25% OffVelvet by Graham and Spencer Nicole Linen Dress Jenni Kayne Flynn Cashmere SweaterUniqlo Trench CoatMaya Brenner The Happiness Retreat NecklaceAriel Gordon Jewelry Royal Signet StudsWith Nothing Underneath The Boyfriend: Linen, Blue StripeDôen Jonie Top J.Crew Chambray Shirt Now 41% OffVeronica Beard Beverly Skinny Flare Jeans Frame The Alix Naadam The Original Cashmere SweaterBrochu Walker The Everyday Cashmere Bright CrewPolène Cyme MiniBrochu Walker The Amara BlouseBrochu Walker The Aaron PantSaint Laurent Tribute Nu Pieds 05 Leather SlidesGap CashSoft Shaker-Stitch Crewneck SweaterGap CashSoft Shaker-Stitch Sweater PantsVeronica Beard Charissa Stretch Cotton Dress Theory Etiennette Blazer Anine Bing Carrie PantHeidi Merrick Santa Barbara Frame St. Agni Petit Woven Trapeze BagEmme Parsons Cecilia Leather Thong SandalsWhy Trust ELLEEvery product featured on ELLE.com is independently researched, tested, or editor-approved. html:
As if the titles mother, wife, actress, Duchess, philanthropist, and entrepreneur weren’t enough, today, Meghan Markle takes on a new role: personal shopper. If you found yourself watching With Love, Meghan and envying her simple yet sophisticated style, I’ve got good news for you: The Duchess of Sussex took to her Instagram Stories today to share some of her personal wardrobe favorites, complete with shoppable links.

“A handpicked and curated collection of the things I love—I hope you enjoy them!” reads the banner on Markle’s ShopMy profile, along with a notice that she may earn commission from the affiliate links. “Many of you have asked, so here you go!” she wrote as a caption. Most of her picks are refreshingly affordable and come from stores you might already shop at like Gap, J.Crew, Reformation, and Veronica Beard, for example. In addition to capsule wardrobe staples in cream, navy, and brown tones, you can also shop some of Markle’s favorite accessories, including a bag from celebrity-loved brand St. Agni and her signature Ray-Ban aviators. And let the record show that the Duchess is on board with both flare and skinny jeans, citing Alix Earle’s denim collaboration, specifically.

Below, browse some of the most shoppable items out of the more than 30 favorites that Markle shared. Everyone say, “Thank you, Meghan!”
